title: I lost my phone, I can't remember my recovery account password, Can I send a birth Certificate to?
content: I lost my phone during a camping trip. But I can't remember my passwords to either my main account or recovery account. I can't replace my phone yet because my ID was with the phone, yep I fully understand the problems with folios. But at some point I need o know I can get back into my account and retrieve the thousands of photos and documents on drive and photos some how. Is there and address or form I an fill out to send proof of who I am. And hopefully lock down all my info? HELP!!
